attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These petitions are what ordinary people want, many of these are what individuals think are wrong with this society and need changing. Most also are not difficult to act on and implement. I and probably everyone here and in this country would like to see Tony Blair read, act and implement the ideas here, and people would be happier, have more faith in politics and perhaps even think the P.M was okay after all!!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
